"Feed" the bio-organic exoskeleton by activating <color_light_blue>Feed</color> command under the spellcasting tab (undefined by default). Alternatively, you can activate the <color_yellow>Metabolic Distribution</color> bionic, but it is advisable to use it only if you ran out of flesh.

To complete this mission, obtain a <color_light_green>blob glob</color>. It's the main ingredient in creating food for your suit.
translation:
通过激活“施法”选项卡下的<color_light_blue>喂养</color>命令（默认情况下未设定）来“喂养”生物有机外骨骼。或者，你可以激活<color_yellow>代谢供能</color>CBM，但只有当你的肉类用完了才建议使用它。

想要完成喂食，需要<color_light_green>变形怪糊</color>。它是为你的生物有机外骨骼制作食物的主要成分。
“主巢心智”

translation: *把它捡起来*

original: *asks for its orientation on the fields. Far, mid and near are based from the distance to the outskirts, where far is next to the perimeter walls and vice versa.
translation: *询问其在字段中的方向。远、中、近是从远处到郊区的距离，远在围墙旁边，反之亦然。

original: *can't build right now, as it is currently working on a structure.
translation: *无法立即生成，因为它当前正在处理结构。

original: *consume the DNAs, and a core were formed from its suction tube.
translation: *消耗DNA，吸管就会形成一个核心。

original: *consumes the flesh with its twisted tube. Its orifice started to shrink, as well as its body. You can hear the unnerving heartbeats.
translation: *用扭曲的管子吞噬血肉。它的孔口和身体开始收缩。你能听到令人不安的心跳声。

original: *consumes the provided flesh, then the connected sector starts to throb...
translation: *消耗提供的血肉，然后连接的区域开始跳动…

original: *detaches itself from the ground. It must quickly reattach to the core, as in this state, its body slowly deteriorates…
translation: *从地面脱离。它必须迅速地重新附着到核心，因为在这种状态下，它的身体会慢慢退化…

original:
*enshrouds you with its twisted tube:
The hatchery is specialized in forming amalgam companions. It creates an amalgam using large amounts of flesh for a short period of time.
translation:
*用扭曲的管子把你包裹起来：
孵化室专门用来孵化混合怪伙伴。它在短时间内用大量的血肉来创造一只混合怪。

original: *forms a heap of flesh, which encapsulated you. It felt gross, but you know it'll fix you up.
translation: *形成一堆包裹着你的血肉堆。虽然它很恶心，但你知道它会治好你的。

original: *gently placed the newly formed amalgam infront of you through its twisted tube, as the hatchery slowly reverts back to normal. The amalgam glares at you, and seems to identify your visage.
translation: *轻轻地用扭曲的管子把刚形成的混合怪放在你面前，随后孵化室慢慢恢复正常。混合怪瞪着你，似乎能认出你的样子。
*glob glob*

translation: *正在等你的命令。
*正在形成一只混合怪。
*正在长出一些肉。
*它在起劲儿地摆动。
*它在剧烈地摆动。
*它在颤动。
*必须在它的核心里！

original: *needs 5 spliced DNAs of similar type to form them into its more potent variety - a creature core.
translation: *需要5个相似类型的剪接DNA，才能形成更强大的物种——一个生物核心。

original:
*needs the coordinates to build the bio-organic turret.

       .abcde.
       t.....f
       s..│..g
       r.─┼─.h
       q..│..i
       p.....j
       .onmlk.
translation:
*需要坐标来建造生物有机炮塔。

。阿卡德。
 t…..f 
 s…..g 
 r.—h 
 q…..i 
 p…..j 
.onmlk。

original: *needs the type of item you want to craft.
translation: *需要您希望制作的物品类型。

original: *needs the type of item you want to modify.
translation: *需要你希望修改的物品的类型。

original: *opens an gaping orifice. You can feed the hivemind with flesh, which are then converted into edible meat.
translation: *打开一个大开口。你可以用血肉喂养主巢心智，它可以把血肉变成可食用的肉。
*触手正待命。

original: *readies its weavers as it waits for your command.
translation: *织工正待命。

original: *refuses as the surrounding area is not compatible for bio-organic reconstruction. You might want to create a new hivemind in an open location such as the fields.
translation: *周围区域不适合生物有机重建。也许能在一个开放的位置（如野外）创建新的主巢心智。

original: *refuses to ingest your flesh as it is not enough to perform the mending.
translation: *不能吸收你的血肉，因为它不够完成修复。

original: *responds only when it is adjacent to you.
translation: *与你相邻时才有用。

original: *responds with a subtle shake, as it reveals a gaping orifice.
translation: *微微颤抖并张开管口。

original: *reveals a revolting response, showing its tendrils that are currently in service.
translation: *露出一个令人恶心的反应——展示其正在工作的触手。
*剧烈地摆动。
*颤动。

original:
*stretches its tendril into the vicinity. After some moments, the hivemind taps you, informing you that this area is available for reconstruction, as it open its mouth.
The hivemind needs 1000 flesh to reform itself, and will take an hour to complete.
translation:
*把触手伸向四周。过了一会儿，主巢心智轻拍你，随着它张开嘴，你知道这个区域可以开始重建了。
主巢心智需要1000块血肉，花费1个小时改造完成。

original: *stretches its tendrils and pierced them through the ground. The core pulses in velvety streaks, as it takes control of the camp once again.
translation: *它伸展触手，穿过地面。随着它再次控制营地，核心脉搏在柔软的纹路上。

original: *stretches its tendrils into the ground, then starts to move to an ideal location. It reformed the surrounding tendrils into a circular outline of self-regenerating compact vein walls.
translation: *将触手埋入地下，然后开始移动到理想位置。它将周围的触手向内包裹形成圆形可再生的紧凑脉壁。
*摇动它的触角。

original:
*taps you with its fused tentacles:
The modifier is specialized for creature core infusion, altering the genetic structure of certain bio-organic materials, and thus, allowing that object/entity to acquire the core's capabilities. Note that infusion only works once to an object/entity.
translation:
*用它融合的触须轻拍你：
这个修饰物专门用于生物核心注入，改变某些生物有机材料的遗传结构，从而允许那个物体/实体获得核心的能力。请注意，注入只对对象/实体起作用一次。

original:
*taps you with its suction tube:
The splicer is specialized for DNA acquisition, being the vital companion for creature core production. Creature cores are created via compression of DNAs extracted from the flesh of specific monsters. The splicer will provide a bio-organic device to gather these special types of flesh.
translation:
*它用吸管轻敲你：
拼接器是专门用于DNA采集的，是生物核心生产的重要伙伴。生物核心是通过压缩从特定怪物的肉中提取的DNA而产生的。拼接器将提供一个生物有机装置来收集这些特殊类型的肉。

original: *taps you with its tube, then reveals an orfice at its tip. It needs 350 flesh and will take for about 4 hours to fully form an amalgam.
translation: *用它的管子轻敲你，然后在它的顶端露出了一个孔。它需要350块血肉，大约需要4个小时才能完全形成一只混合怪。

original:
*taps you with its weaving tendril:
The artifice creates an object using organic compounds such as meat and creature cores, and flesh being the main ingredient. You will have to give all ingredients to the artifice and it will produce the selected item in an instant. It is not capable of creating certain items from the start, but several augmentations will eventually allow it to perform complex crafts.
translation:
*它用交织的触手轻拍你：
这个装置用肉和生物核心等有机物制造物品，以血肉作为主要原料。你需要把所有的原料投入机器，它就会在瞬间制造出选定的物品。一开始，有些东西它造不出来，但经过几次强化最终能让它做出复杂的工艺品。
*颤抖

original: *trembles as it creates the device. After some moments, it spews out the object in front of you.
translation: *颤抖着制造装置。过了片刻，它就会喷出你面前的物体。

original: *withdraw its surrounding tendrils as soon as you revoke the establishment of the camp.
translation: *你一撤销营地的建立，它周围的卷须就立刻缩了起来。
+10%斩击，+3% 移动耗时

original:
<color_light_red>Equipment on this profession is in WIP state. Use at your own risk!</color>
You are a military recruit tasked to perform an alpha field test on the bio-organic power armor - the flesh vessel - installed with necessary bionics. After the Cataclysm struck, your connection to the team were lost.
translation:
<color_light_red>本专业设备处于在制品状态。使用风险自负！</color>
你是一名新兵，任务是对装有必要仿生装置的生物有机动力装甲（脉管装甲）进行阿尔法实地测试。大灾难发生后，你和实验团队失去了联系。
context:

original:
<color_light_red>Equipment on this profession is in WIP state. Use at your own risk!</color>
You are one of the finest super soldiers ever trained and specialized to harness the experimental exoskeleton "flesh vessel".  Unfortunately, the outbreak has already took place to the point escaping is impossible.  As far as you can tell, military command abandoned you in this hellhole when you missed the emergency evac
translation:
<color_light_red>本专业设备处于在制品状态。使用风险自负！</color>
你是有史以来在训练和专业驾驭实验性外骨骼“脉管装甲”上最优秀的超级士兵之一。不幸的是，疫情已经发生到无法逃脱的地步。据你所知，当你错过紧急撤离时，军事指挥部把你遗弃在这个地狱里。

original:
<color_light_red>Equipment on this profession is in WIP state. Use at your own risk!</color>
You've been selected to operate the bio-organic exoskeleton "flesh vessel" and were supposed to receive a special training after that as just in the right time, the base were already overwhelmed by the undead.  As far as you can tell, military command abandoned you in this hellhole when you missed the emergency evac.
translation:
<color_light_red>此职业的装备正在开发中，使用需自负风险！</color>
你被选中操作生物有机外骨骼“血肉脉管”，本应在此之后接受特殊训练，但不巧的是，在你接收外骨骼的恰当时机，基地已经被丧尸淹没。据你所知，当你错过紧急疏散时，军方已经抛弃了你，让你留在这个地狱般的地方。

original:
A complex battle suit brought to existence using the latest technological advancements. Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel (Agile)" is an outcome of mutagenic devolution, having thinner fibers and flesh webbings. Its greatly reduced physical protection has also made it extremely lighter than any other types; the vessel focuses on bringing the wearer's speed in order to outrun its foe. Like all other flesh vessels, it requires the wearer to feed it with flesh.

Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel (Agile)" provides:
<color_white>Speed: <color_light_green>+10%</color>
Attack speed: <color_light_green>+10%</color>
Movecost: <color_light_green>-5%</color>
Stamina regeneration: <color_light_green>20%</color></color>
translation:
一种利用最新研究成果制造出来的合成战斗服。Secronom外骨骼型号“脉管（敏捷型）”，是诱变的成果，具有更细的纤维和血肉织带。大大减少的物理保护也使得它比任何其他型号都要轻；这种脉管专注于提高佩戴者的速度，以超越敌人。像所有其他血肉脉管一样，它需要佩戴者用血肉来喂养它。

 Secronom外骨骼型号“脉管（敏捷型）”提供：
<color_white>速度：<color_light_green>+10%</color>
攻击速度： <color_light_green>+10%</color>
移动消耗： <color_light_green>-5%</color>
耐力恢复： <color_light_green>20%</color></color>

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#secronom_lore_expansion→TOOL_ARMOR→secro_power_armor_flesh_coward

original:
A complex battle suit brought to existence using the latest technological advancements. Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel (Gunner)" is an offbranch mutation of a standard vessel, having lesser flesh membranes and webbings in exchange for greater perception. Its body orientation is built to handle several projectile-shooting armaments and to quickly form a gunner creation. Thus, it is ideal for long- to mid-ranged combats. Like all other flesh vessels, it requires the wearer to feed it with flesh.

Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel (Gunner)" provides:
<color_white>Perception: <color_light_green>+4</color>
Metabolism: <color_light_green>-5%</color></color>
translation:
采用最新科技打造的复杂战斗服。Secronom外骨骼型号“载具（炮手）”是标准载具的一个分支变异体，以较少的肉体膜和网状结构为代价，换取了更强的感知能力。其躯体结构设计用于操作多种射击武器，并能迅速形成炮手形态，因此非常适合中远距离作战。与所有肉体载具一样，它需要穿戴者供给肉体以维持功能。


Secronom外骨骼型号“载具（炮手）”提供以下加成：

<color_white> 感知力：+4 <color_light_green>
</color> 新陈代谢：-5% <color_light_green>
</color>

original:
A complex battle suit brought to existence using the latest technological advancements. Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel (Pathogen)" is the result of prolonged research for augmentation using mutagens. Its cell structure is much more intricate than the other vessel types. Yet due to its extreme need of flesh, users may not last long wearing the suit.

Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel (Pathogen)" provides:
<color_white>Maximum health: <color_light_green>+5%</color>
Biological armor: <color_light_green>+1</color>
Metabolism: <color_light_green>-20%</color></color>

Activate to perform:
<color_cyan><color_pink>[FORM]</color> Hivemind</color> - <color_yellow>500 movecost</color>/<color_red>50 flesh</color>
<color_white>* Your flesh vessel forms a sentient flesh hivemind. This hivemind starts off as an overseer, and will eventually die if left inactive. Interact for additional commands.</color>

一种利用最新研究成果制造出来的合成战斗服。Secronom外骨骼型号“脉管（病原型）”是长期使用诱变剂增强研究的结果。它的细胞结构比其他脉管装甲复杂得多。然而，由于它对血肉的极度需求，使用者恐怕不能长时间地穿着它。

 Secronom外骨骼型号“脉管（病原型）”提供：
<color_white>最大生命值：<color_light_green>+5%</color> 
生物护甲：<color_light_green>+1 </color> 
新陈代谢：<color_light_green>-20%</color> </color> 

激活使用：
<color_cyan> <color_pink>[形成]</color> 主巢心智 </color>-<color_yellow> 500移动消耗</color>/<color_red> 50血肉</color>

original: Formed using the flesh's versatile cell reconstruction. This bio-organic pickaxe has an intensely compressed bone on its head and a calcified flesh as its handle.
translation: 利用肌肉的多功能细胞重建而成。这种生物有机鹤嘴锄头上有一块高度压缩的骨头，柄上有一块钙化的肉。

original:
Formed using the flesh's versatile cell reconstruction. This bio-organic rifle shoots needle-like bone projectiles toward its target. It has no trigger mechanism, the rifle only responds to the user's command. Once it receives an input, it generates a tendon shock in the chamber that projects the bullet through its long barrel with high velocity.

Activate to perform:
<color_cyan><color_pink>[FORM]</color> Replenish</color> - <color_yellow>800 moves</color>/<color_light_red>5 hp (random)</color>
<color_white>* Your bone rifle creation commands the vessel to form a stack of bone needles by processing the user's flesh.</color>
translation:
利用肉体的多功能细胞重建而成。这种生物有机步枪向目标发射针状骨弹。它没有触发机制，步枪只响应用户的命令。一旦它接收到输入，它就会在弹膛中产生肌腱冲击，以高速将子弹穿过它的长筒。

激活执行：
 <color_cyan> <color_pink>[表单] </color>补充- <color_yellow> 800移动/ <color_light_red> 5 hp（随机）
<color_white> *你创建的骨步枪命令血管通过处理用户的肉来形成一堆骨针。</color>

original: Formed using the flesh's versatile cell reconstruction. This bio-organic spear is tipped with a barbed bone head, while the rest is made of flesh webbings and fibers.
translation: 利用肌肉的多功能细胞重建而成。这种生物有机长矛顶端有一个带刺的骨头，而其余的是由肉织带和纤维制成的。

original: From prolonged alteration, your tongue have sightly become thicker and harder, yet still retains its flexibility.
translation: 经过长时间的改变，你的舌头明显变粗变硬，但仍然保持着柔韧性。

A complex battle suit brought to existence using the latest technological advancements. Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel" takes advantage of the flesh's adaptive cell structure and its capability to respond from one's mind.

目前它还未与任何东西合并。激活后将永久与之合并。

original:
It is currently not merged with anything. Activate to permanently merge with it.

A complex battle suit brought to existence using the latest technological advancements. Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel" takes advantage of the flesh's adaptive cell structure and its capability to respond from one's mind. Certain bionics must be installed to take full control of it.

original: Oh not exactly, rather scientist. The Flesh is organic flesh-like matter designed for wide variety of purposes. In short, it can be grown into various tissues with various structure. It can create muscles, bones, organs, glands, even whole self sufficient micro and macro organisms.
translation: 噢，不完全是，更确切地说是科学家。 “血肉”是一种有机的、类似于肉的物质，设计用于各种目的。简而言之，它可以生长成具有各种结构的各种组织。它可以创造肌肉、骨骼、器官、腺体，甚至整个自给自足的微观和宏观生物体。

original: Oh yes, it took many years to gather funds, collect gear and set it all up down here. Through years of my research I was leading various projects and collected quite a lot of funds. Later on I had to tightly lock this place and move permanently to other facility.
translation: 哦，是的，我花了很多年的时间来筹集资金和收集设备，终于在这里把它建立起来。在此我进行了多年研究，还领导了各种项目，并积攒了大量资金。可后来我不得不把这个地方紧紧地封闭起来，人也永远的神转移到其他地方去了。

Very scarce and limited to military use only, it was designed to take on the main force of the battlefield thanks to its exotic yet nigh indestructible material, especially supplemented with a variety of gun morphs. Unfortunately, it requires one to wear a bio-organic power and link it with the mech to accept you as its rider.
translation: 这种实验性的机械类型“肉”是最新的（也是最后一个）机械西服生产的工程师的Secronom项目。非常稀少，仅限于军事用途，它的设计是采取对战场上的主要力量感谢其异国情调，但几乎坚不可摧的材料，特别是与各种枪支变形补充。不幸的是，它需要一个穿生物有机权力和链接它与机械接受你作为它的骑手。

original:
This is science, you see? You may think we're the gruesome ones, but what we want is to open up new discoveries for us all. Yes, we messed up, but we're still here, struggling and helping each other to survive this nightmare.
I can't change your opinion towards us, but if you want to know more about the secronom project, talk to our researcher.
translation:
这就是科学，明白吗？你可能认为我们是可怕的，但我们想要的是为我们所有人打开新的发现。是的，我们搞砸了，但我们仍然在这里，努力和帮助对方度过这场噩梦。
我不能改变你对我们的看法，但如果你想了解更多关于secronom项目的信息，请与我们的研究人员联系。

original:
Those mutants think different than a zombified egghead, and probably they're in the woods, having a stroll.
We discovered them by applying a super concentrated type of mutagen into each of our subjects, and the results, few of them transformed into these abominations, while the rest died... which is unfortunate, as our team thought their masculine body can handle such potential power.
translation:
这些变种人的思维方式和丧尸蛋头不同，他们可能在树林里散步。
我们通过在每个受试者身上应用一种超浓缩的诱变剂发现了它们，结果，其中很少有人转化成这些可憎的东西，而其余的人都死了…这是不幸的，因为我们的团队认为他们男性化的身体可以处理这种潜在的力量。

什么？那可不好…
